title: THEORY: The Walking Dead & AMC are Lying to Us
author: Reel Talk
comment: As a fan of this series I am happy that it is being planned to end, I want an epic and well-written and well-plained ending.  And with Daryl as one of my favorite characters, I want the end of his character arc to take place within the series, honoring the character's origins and where he was created and idealized.
Personally, I'm not interested in a Daryl/Carol spinoff.

I highly doubt it's a lie. AMC doesn't have the balls to piss people of like that.  Ever since Dwight and Rick left the show I thought Daryl and Carol could fulfill there role in the commonwealth but it looks like maybe Magna will replace Dwight instead.
description:
Are AMC and The Walking Dead lying to use about who is going to survive until the end of the series. Is it possible that Carol will actually die during the final season despite being confirmed to be apart of the newly announced spin-off? Let's discuss!
